metadata.Title: CVE-2015-7581 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
actionpack/lib/action_dispatch/routing/route_set.rb in Action Pack in Rubyon Rails 4.x before 4.2.5.1 and 5.x before 5.0.0.beta1.1 allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (superfluous caching and memoryconsumption) by leveraging an application's use of a wildcard controllerroute.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-7581` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

rails - 2:4.2.6-1
ruby-actionmailer - 2:4.2.6-1
ruby-actionpack - 2:4.2.6-1
ruby-actionview - 2:4.2.6-1
ruby-activejob - 2:4.2.6-1
ruby-activemodel - 2:4.2.6-1
ruby-activerecord - 2:4.2.6-1
ruby-activesupport - 2:4.2.6-1
ruby-rails - 2:4.2.6-1
ruby-railties - 2:4.2.6-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: rails package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:4.2.6-1').
